## Transforming Data into Financial Strategy
I am a highly organized Finance Professional with over **10 years of experience** bridging the gap between traditional **Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A)** and modern **Data Science**.
My expertise lies in building robust financial models, ensuring internal controls (SOX/IFRS), and leveraging predictive modeling to drive strategic decision-making.






NoteOpen for Consulting



I am currently accepting new projects for financial modeling and data analysis.

title: Consulting Services
text: I help organizations bridge the gap between traditional finance and modern data science.

title: Consulting Services
text:
üìä Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A)
Move beyond static spreadsheets. * Dynamic Budgeting: Automated forecasting models using Python/R. * Variance Analysis: Deep-dive investigations into P&L deviations. * Unit Economics: Calculation of CAC, LTV, and Churn metrics.

title: Consulting Services
text:
ü§ñ Process Automation
Reduce manual work and errors in your finance team. * Report Automation: Scripts to generate daily/weekly financial reports automatically. * Data Cleaning: Transforming messy raw data into analysis-ready formats.

title: Consulting Services
text:
üìà Business Intelligence

Dashboards: Custom Power BI or Tableau dashboards for executive decision-making.
KPI Definition: Identifying and tracking the metrics that actually matter.
